## Bee.makeFeedWriter() method

Make a new feed writer for updating feeds

**Signature:**

```typescript
makeFeedWriter(topic: Topic | Uint8Array | string, signer?: PrivateKey | Uint8Array | string, options?: BeeRequestOptions): FeedWriter;
```
